name: 20 Level Dungeon
description:
A 20 level demo dungeon made as a Solo project for University. The game is build for android and demonstrates the following mechanics:

-Swipe / Touch Input

Working Abilities, casting and cooldowns

Working Inventory system, that can add and remove items

Intractable dialog with an NPC

Working ladder

Basic enemy AI

Working menu and music / sfx toggling

More levels may be on the way in the near future. Artwork is not my own.
